text:
From our partners @SaportaReport: Metro #Atlanta news of the week includes the Westside #BeltLine Connector grand opening, Civic Walls and Bad Asian paint a solidarity mural and Georgians 17+ are eligible for the #COVID19 #vaccine. 

Read more here: https://t.co/ot3slKOVHt https://t.co/IKT35m71bY
